title: Compass
summaries: The Compass is an informational accessory that enables an on-screen display of the player's lateral position when equipped. Position is shown in the number of feet (1 foot = 1/2 tile) to the East or West of the center of the map. The center of the map is usually very close to the initial spawn point. In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Compass has a 1.2*1/83 (1.2%) chance to be dropped by Salamanders, Giant Shellys, and Crawdads, a 1.33*1/75 (1.33%) chance to be dropped by Piranhas, and a 2*1/50 (2%) chance to be dropped by Mother Slimes, Snow Flinxes, Undead Vikings, and Armored Vikings. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, it has a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) chance to be dropped by Mimics. On the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it is unobtainable (no longer drops, but still exists), and is not functional.
